Package es.utils.mapper.factory.builder

Provides a a Step builder implementation for creating a ElementMapper step by step.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Builder<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Last step of the builder that manage the creation of the getter operation.
    Consume<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Last step of the EMBuilder (before the building one) that manage the consumer the value and does not set any value.
    DefaultInput<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Optional step of the builder that allow to specify a default value if the getter of the From step is null.
    DefaultOutput<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Optional step of the builder that allow to specify a default value if the result of the Transformer step is null.
    From<IN,OUT>
    First mandatory step of the builder that manage the creation of the getter operation.
    Name<IN,OUT>
    First (optional) step of the builder that allow too set a name to the ElementMapper.
    To<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Last step of the builder (before the building one) that manage the creation of the setter operation.
    Transformer<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Optional and repeatable step of the builder that allow to specify a transformer between the result of the getter and the input of the setter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EMBuilder<IN,GETTER_OUT,SETTER_IN,OUT>
    Step builder implementation to help the use to create easily an ElementMapper;

Package es.utils.mapper.factory.builder Description

Provides a a Step builder implementation for creating a ElementMapper step by step.
The steps are:
  1. From: (mandatory) create the getter.
  2. DefaultInput: (optional) allow to specify a default value if the getter of the From step is null.
  3. Transformer: (optional, repeatable) create the transformer between the result of the getter and the input of the setter. It is possible to concatenate multiple transformations.
  4. DefaultOutput: (optional) allow to specify a default value if the result of the transformation is null.
  5. To: (mandatory) create the setter.
  6. ElementMapperBuilder: (mandatory) create the ElementMapper.


Here the flow chart of the builder:

eschoysman
